name: Girls Hobby in LOVE
description:
Six girls have a hobby group. One likes to listen to music, another likes to draw, and the third likes to read. Each girl is special in her interests. When you come to the clubs and want to choose which one to join, each girl wants you to choose her club! A ruthless scene of jealousy, frowns and distrust between the girls unfolds, because each one wants you to choose her! Which one will you like more?

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level


In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. (◕‿◕)♡

Special Features

  • 🎻 Live2D dynamic character
  • 🎨 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🎾 Well-drawn CGs
  • ♟️ Relaxing music
  • 📚 Puzzle game
